metadata.name: Customer NFT
metadata.description:
This NFT gives its holder exclusive access to GoodHeat Sponsored events, airdrops, and rights to purchase special GoodHeat merchandise.  
This NFT also allows it owner to claim a one time metaverse wearable featuring the wearable design displayed.  
The IP of the design is owned by GoodHeat, however the owner of this NFT is allowed the right to us this IP.
